_sText:
This is my first try at making an AWP map. In the development I wanted to make a original map. Which turned out to be a simple yet awesome map ^^ I've learnt a couple of new stuff. Things included in the map:

AWP_FLOAT

The map includes the following: - Models (diffrent on both sides, to create variations) - Fog - Displacements - 18 spawn points for both, Terrorists and Counter Terrorists. - Ladder - HDR - dustmotes - cubemaps - light/spotlights I hope you will try it out and maybe add it to a server ^^ if you do please let me know. I may make this into a gg_map as well ^^ I may do that later if some of you guys want it. I also made a video of the map, check it out! I used source recorder to record it then demo smoother to make the nice smooth effect to it ^^ It was my first time trying out the demo smoother, so it's a bit buggy ^^ I also mixed the video with the music in some places. enjoy!
